file_content.text: Why can't there be a maintenance manual?
Hey. Can you cut the power? Right over there.
Thanks. Wouldn't want to electrocute myself on top of everything else.
She's really something, this ship, but no one's been taking care of her.
No offense, but it's the Gravestone that will save the galaxy from Arcann. Not you, not me... definitely not Senya.
She said your ambition was showing.
What Senya said about you....
I'm not so sure about Senya's motives.
I don't trust her.
Lana believes she can help us. That's enough for me.
I'll take her assistance.
Hey, I trust Lana. I think the world of--
Look, I'm just saying she might not know Senya as well as she thinks.
[Let him continue]
You both want the same thing. Let the past be the past.
Let it go.
Lana and I, we had our time. It was good.
She ended all that once she proved you were still alive. We had to put all our focus into finding you.
I'd be a frozen carcass if you hadn't.
I'm grateful you rescued me.
And you did it. You found me. Where's your focus now?
[Flirt] You did well.
I'm a little confused. I saw the way you were with Lana....
I'm allowed to have second thoughts.
You're more my type.
Maybe there was something there, but she doesn't interest me anymore.
[Lie] I'm not into Lana.
I like to keep myself open to possibilities.
Whatever happens, happens.
A fence-sitter. Got it.
I should get back to it. Need to be sure the Gravestone can get us all the way to Asylum.
Wait till you see the Gravestone in all its glory. You might have to wait a while, but....
You've grown attached rather quickly.
Her head's been filled with Arcann's lies for so long, I don't know if it's worth trying to make sense of her.
A voice of reason. Thank you!
I put all my trust in Lana and she goes to Senya for help. She does not know what she's getting us into.
Senya acts according to... I don't know what. Her own narrow concept of justice, maybe.
Even if her objectives align with yours, it doesn't mean she'll do what you need to get done--believe me.
If she's really in it to stop Arcann, I'll try. But I shouldn't be the one having to bend over backward to convince you of anything.
Don't forget who dropped everything for Lana and put all his focus into finding you.
You really care about Lana, don't you?
You and Lana are close....
Right, the "part" I was looking for. That was.... I have been known to make a fool of myself now and then.
I have a good feeling, you know. We'll get Arcann.
I'm still into Lana.
I'm sure you know my history with Lana. Keep it in mind.
I'll do that.
And now you should be focused on Arcann, not each other.
Less romance, more readiness.
Take it easy. I know what I've got to do.
I'm a little confused. I thought you and Lana were....
Well, that's... good to know. I'll keep it in mind.
On the ship, of course. But that could change.
Hey. If Senya shines that narrow spotlight of hers on you, check your shadow.
Hey. I know Lana doesn't seem to be in the talking mood, but maybe check in on her.
Hey. Maybe you should check in on Lana. See how that wound's doing.
You sure got attached in a hurry.
I'm still into Lana.
What did Senya do to earn this grudge?
What did she do to you?
She was ruthless. After we deserted, she hunted us for months. Everyone on my crew bled more than once on account of her.
It's not like you're thinking. We've worked together for years, and she's saved my life more times than I can count.
So, I do what I can to return the favor. If that means storming into the Spire to pull some Outlander out of carbonite, well... that's what I'll do.
Just... don't forget who dropped everything to storm the Spire and and help Lana pull you out of carbonite. All right?
That was your choice. I never asked you to do any of this.
I don't owe you anything.
You're really not hearing me.
